DataElement.preferredName: Maximum Tissue Mean Blood Standardized Uptake Value Ratio Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the maximum agent Standard Uptake Value (SUV) in tumor tissue relative to the mean SUV of the agent in aortic blood.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Maximum Tissue Mean Blood Standardized Uptake Value Comparison
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The largest possible quantity or degree._The absorption by a tissue of some substance, food material, mineral, etc., and its permanent or temporary retention._The largest possible quantity or degree._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._The sum of a set of values divided by the number of values in the set._Blood circulating throughout the body._An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) 1[injected dose (nCi) 1 body weight (g)]._The examination of two or more people or things in order to detect similarities and differences.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: the largest possible quantity or degree.:An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.:The sum of a set of values divided by the number of values in the set.:Blood circulating throughout the body.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: The largest possible quantity or degree.
An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.
The sum of a set of values divided by the number of values in the set.

A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: The examination of two or more people or things in order to detect similarities and differences.:An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) 1[injected dose (nCi) 1 body weight (g)].

Concepts.definition: The examination of two or more people or things in order to detect similarities and differences.

An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) / [injected dose (nCi) / body weight (g)].

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

The absorption by a tissue of some substance, food material, mineral, etc., and its permanent or temporary retention.
